= authorsearch =

List of authors that post about a query.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*  || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| q       || string || Search query string. (required) ||
|| window  || string || Time window for results. (optional, default: auto) Options: `auto` - automatically pick the most relevant window. `h` last hour, `d` last day, `w` last week, `m` last month, `a` all time ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/authorsearch.json?q=San+Francisco+Giants
}}}

This will fetch search results in json format for author that are most relevant to the query San Francisco Giants.
